select count(*) from bus_lawyer lawyer left join sys_user sus on lawyer.sys_user_id = sus.id left join sys_re_user_role rur on rur.user_id = lawyer.sys_user_id left join sys_role role on role.id = rur.role_id where lawyer.is_delete = 0
and lawyer.name like #{ name }

SELECT law.id as lawyerId, law.name as lawyerName, law.adviser as isAdviser, a.score, a.notAuditNum, a.auditNum FROM bus_lawyer law left join (select la.id, avg(case when ba.state=4 then aa.score end) as score, count(case when ba.state in(1,2,3)then 1 end) as notAuditNum, count(case when ba.state=4 then 1 end) as auditNum from bus_lawyer la left join bus_agreement_audit aa on aa.lawyer_id = la.id left join bus_agreement ba on ba.id = aa.agreement_id group by la.id )as a on a.id = law.id order by is_delete
, notAuditNum
,isAdviser desc
,auditNum desc
, score desc
